title: Why French Bread Pizza Never Disappoints
text:
WHAT THE HECK is happening to pizza? Once a low-key food of the people, a paragon of nonchalant excellence, it has become the next culinary fetish. There’s the retroactive “discovery” of micro-regional styles—and have you seen the stack of new cookbooks on the subject from chefs? We’re encouraged to build pizza ovens in our backyards or buy special (read: expensive) contraptions that take up kitchen real estate most of us don’t have.

If you ask me, there’s only one type of pizza suited to home cooking, and that’s because...
description: Is it authentic? Do we care? French bread pizza delivers, whether it’s the frozen variety or a wholly personal homemade one-off.
